overview: Holy shit, we've done it this time. We've put a dozen dirty newbies onto one epic disc. There are good girls like Jessi Grey and Dylan Carter, who finger-fucked their pussies on-camera once then left the business. Then there are the insatiable amateurs who filmed for us hoping it would lead to superstardom - like Alex Tanner, whose innocent face and hairless young cunt makes for an incredible jerk session.
title: Naughty First Timers X-Cut
